meanings.definition: The quality of being constructive or helpful in nature.
meanings.sent1: Her constructiveness in the group project was evident as she always had great ideas to improve our work.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the constructiveness of your feedback on my presentation.
meanings.sent3: His constructiveness in the meeting made everyone feel motivated and encouraged.
meanings.sent4: The constructiveness of her advice was like a guiding light in the darkness of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The constructiveness of teamwork can lead to amazing results.

meanings.definition: The act of building or creating something.
meanings.sent1: The constructiveness of the new bridge was a significant achievement for the engineering team.
meanings.sent2: The constructiveness of the artist's work was admired by all who saw it.
meanings.sent3: The constructiveness of the Lego blocks allowed the children to create endless structures.
meanings.sent4: The constructiveness of his efforts in the garden resulted in a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent5: The constructiveness of the construction workers was evident in the completion of the building ahead of schedule.

meanings.definition: The tendency to contribute positively to a situation or conversation.
meanings.sent1: Her constructiveness in the discussion helped to find a solution to the problem quickly.
meanings.sent2: The constructiveness of his attitude brought a positive atmosphere to the team meeting.
meanings.sent3: The constructiveness of his jokes lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent4: The constructiveness of her smile was contagious, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The constructiveness of his words inspired others to take action.
